name: CYCLOPS STAIRS
description:
WELCOME, DIMENSIONAL TRAVELLER!

In this short Sci-Fi adventure, you will explore a weird, forgotten realm.

As you progress, the environment tells the story and secrets may emerge from the ruins. What place is this? What happened to it? 

FEATURES

  • Retro graphic style from PS2 era.
  • 1 Hour to finish the game. But its up to you to explore the world details.
    Stay as much as you want!
  • Three levels with different atmospheres and mood.
  • Creepy, electronic ambient music.
  • Simple, classic FPS  controls on computer.
  • ONE button control in Virtual Reality (Oculus Go remote).
  • Very high stairs and altitude, so be aware for VR... (Stay safe!)
  • No death, no saves, no pressure. Just walk/run  and explore...

If you own a Virtual Reality headset  Oculus GO:

Oculus GO (Sideload .APK): You can install the .APK version onto the Oculus GO via sideloading. For most people, the easiest way to do this is to install via SideQuest. After configuring your Oculus GO for developer mode, and installing/setting up Sidequest on your desktop, you can then just drag and drop the APK into SideQuest in the area in the top left corner.

Launch  CYCLOPS STAIRS  on the Oculus GO by navigating to the Library, selecting the Unknown Sources category on the left, look for "CyclopsStairs" on the right, and run it.

Also, you can watch  a great tutorial video by Virtual Reality Oasis.

* If you own an Oculus Quest, you can try the game on it (NOT TESTED).
